name: Following Protocol
description:
You are chosen to be an operator of a new early missile detection system, and it's your job to keep your nation safe.

Following Protocol is a short game developed over 5 months for school. You receive orders, press buttons, flick switches and make decisions. It's a relatively short game, but it can take a few minutes to learn the basics. After that, the game progresses quickly. It's more like a 10-20 minute experience than a full game. Anyway, I hope you enjoy it, and any feedback would be appreciated, as would any bug reports.
Good luck!
